title: GPS DMS to GPS-DD Converter
name: LGF_GpsToGpsDD
description: This function converts a given GPS data type (format direction, degrees, minutes, and seconds) into a GPS-DD data type (decimal degrees).

input.name: gps
input.description: GPS-Data to be converted (direction, degrees, minutes, and seconds)

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeGPS
user_defined_types.description: Datatype for GPS Coordinates with direction, degrees, minutes, seconds.

member.name: latitude
member.description: Datatype for GPS Coordinates in DMS and the Direction.

member.name: longitude
member.description: Datatype for GPS Coordinates in DMS and the Direction.

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeGPS_DD
user_defined_types.description: Datatype for GPS Coordinates in decimal degrees.

member.name: longitude
member.description: Degrees longitude in degrees with decimal places
